Class KubernetesCreator.NodePool

java.lang.Object
com.github.cowwoc.digitalocean.resource.KubernetesCreator.NodePool
Enclosing class:
KubernetesCreator
public static final class KubernetesCreator.NodePool extends Object
A pool of worker nodes.

  • Constructor Details

    • NodePool

      public NodePool(DigitalOceanClient client, String name, DropletType.Id dropletType, int initialNumberOfNodes)
      Creates a new node pool.
      Parameters:
      client - the client configuration
      name - the name of the node pool
      dropletType - the type of droplets to use for cluster nodes
      initialNumberOfNodes - the initial number of nodes to populate the pool with
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any of the arguments are null
      IllegalArgumentException - if:
      • any of the arguments contain leading or trailing whitespace or are empty.
      • initialNumberOfNodes is negative or zero.

    • autoscale

      public KubernetesCreator.NodePool autoscale(int minNodes, int maxNodes)
      Configures the pool size to adjust automatically to meet demand.
      Parameters:
      minNodes - the minimum number of nodes in the pool
      maxNodes - the maximum number of nodes in the pool
      Returns:
      this
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if:
      • minNodes is greater than initialNumberOfNodes()
      • maxNodes is less than initialNumberOfNodes()

    • autoScale

      public boolean autoScale()
      Indicates if the pool size should adjust automatically to meet demand.
      Returns:
      true if the pool size should adjust automatically to meet demand
